resources.string: 1. Click to select source language and translation destination language
2. (1)Site to download files, (2)Source language, (3)Translation service, (4)Target language
4. Drag on screen with one finger to create a translation area, then drag with two fingers to move and resize
7. Tap outside of result window or click back button to clear result
** Drag menu button to move or click menu button to open menu **
